We found most of COVID-19 patients in this study were mild/moderate ones. Compared with those COVID-19 patients in the epidemic area Wuhan city, the proportions of patients with severe/critical clinical status and patients who needed ICU care or mechanical ventilation in this study were relatively lower [ 6]. This is mainly because Guangzhou can screen all suspected patients and has enough medical resources to ensure that all confirmed COVID-19 patients can be admitted to the designated hospital as soon as possible.
